Posts.Content: Feb 22, 2008 09:44PM violet wrote: 1. Some kind of cream to massage your feet -- seriously! 2.Â A friend to give you foot massages. 3. Also, sock-type slippers that you can throw away when you leave. I always take 2 or more pairs of socks -- one to wear when I walk on the floor (even in my room). As soon as I sit on my bed I change out of those filthy ones and into a clean pair that I feel okay about getting into bed with. 4. Good bottled water
